about_the_game:
"Pathfinder 2 RPG - Lost Omens: Highhelm


Delve the mountain deep!

When the first dwarves reached the surface of Golarion, they built enormous keeps as a monument to their legacy and to serve as their new home. The mightiest of these keeps was Highhelm, a Sky Citadel deep in the Five Kings Mountains. While other Sky Citadels have fallen since the Quest for Sky, Highhelm holds strong, serving as one of the major centers of dwarven culture.

Lost Omens Highhelm delves deep into the Emperor's Peak to present Highhelm in all its glory. This book details everyday life in the city, dwarven culture, and the various clans that influence the Sky Citadel. It also provides a full gazetteer of the city's layers and surroundings, each with adventuring locations and sites of intrigue suitable for a multitude of adventures. An included poster map presents Highhelm's layers in high detail and serves as an aid for campaigns centered on the dwarven city. Characters looking for new options can visit Highhelm for new equipment, ancestry feats, animal companions, and more!

Lost Omens: Highelm is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:

  • A fully developed Reference Manual that brings to life all the rich history and details of the Sky Citadel, Highhelm
  • A wealth of information (trade, workshops, culture, and more!) that makes Highhelm a perfect location to base an entire campaign out of, including tie-ins to the Sky King's Tomb Adventure Path
  • New ancestries and heritages related to Highhelm and the various clans and factions
  • New backgrounds, skills, and feats suitable for a Highhelm character
  • New items and magic that can be easily dropped onto a character or into a campaign, fully ready to use, including new material, relics, and legendary items
  • New animal companions specific to the Five Kings Mountains and Highhelm
  • New deities for the dwarves of the Five Kings Mountains and Highhelm
  • Gorgeous full-colored illustration to share and marvel over
"
detailed_description:
"Pathfinder 2 RPG - Lost Omens: Highhelm


Delve the mountain deep!

When the first dwarves reached the surface of Golarion, they built enormous keeps as a monument to their legacy and to serve as their new home. The mightiest of these keeps was Highhelm, a Sky Citadel deep in the Five Kings Mountains. While other Sky Citadels have fallen since the Quest for Sky, Highhelm holds strong, serving as one of the major centers of dwarven culture.

Lost Omens Highhelm delves deep into the Emperor's Peak to present Highhelm in all its glory. This book details everyday life in the city, dwarven culture, and the various clans that influence the Sky Citadel. It also provides a full gazetteer of the city's layers and surroundings, each with adventuring locations and sites of intrigue suitable for a multitude of adventures. An included poster map presents Highhelm's layers in high detail and serves as an aid for campaigns centered on the dwarven city. Characters looking for new options can visit Highhelm for new equipment, ancestry feats, animal companions, and more!

  • A fully developed Reference Manual that brings to life all the rich history and details of the Sky Citadel, Highhelm

  • New ancestries and heritages related to Highhelm and the various clans and factions

  • New animal companions specific to the Five Kings Mountains and Highhelm
  • New deities for the dwarves of the Five Kings Mountains and Highhelm

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
